content.text1: We love kids and youth. And because of that we highly value the time we are able to be with them. We use our own Jesus-centred curriculum to help our kids and youth learn to love and follow Jesus in a safe and welcoming environment.
We use our own Jesus-centred curriculum to help kids and youth learn to love and follow Jesus in a safe and welcoming environment.

We walk alongside our youth as they learn to love and follow Jesus, sharing his message with others. Our Junior High program (grades 6-8) consists of Sunday morning gatherings during our services, as well as a midweek gathering. Our Senior High students (grades 9-12) remain in the service on Sundays and gather midweek for teaching and small groups. We use our own Jesus-centred youth curriculum and provide our youth with opportunities to build relationships, talk about Jesus, and engage in their community.
Interested in using our curriculum? Visit our dedicated site for Sunday morning teaching, midweek resources, and The Parent Blog.

content.text1: Kidmax is our Sunday morning program for infants to grade 5. We use our own Jesus-centred curriculum to help our kids learn to love and follow Jesus in a safe and welcoming environment. We also want to empower parents to be the primary spiritual caregivers of their children, so we provide weekly take-home materials with each lesson.
